CrmMovList.customFilter: EXISTS (select 1 from crm_mov_hist h where h.crm_mov_id = crm_mov.id and descritivo ilike \'%{$value}%\')
CrmMovList.label: Descritivo do histórico

CrmMovListExtDetails.customFilter: EXISTS (select 1 from crm_mov_hist h where h.crm_mov_id = crm_mov.id and h.descritivo ilike \'%{$value}%\' and h.visual_ext = \'S\')
CrmMovListExtDetails.label: Descritivo do histórico

CrmMovListExt.customFilter: EXISTS (select 1 from crm_mov_hist h where h.crm_mov_id = crm_mov.id and h.descritivo ilike \'%{$value}%\' and h.visual_ext = \'S\')
CrmMovListExt.label: Descritivo do histórico
